exit_app_message: Are you sure you want to exit the app?
email_verification_message: Please check your email for verification
begin_creating_profile: Begin creating your StatDoctor profile below:
by_continuing_agree: By continuing, you agree to our
enter_verification_code: Enter the 4-digit verification code we just sent on your Phone Number.
enter_your_data_to_create_account: Enter Your Data to Create Account
do_you_want_to_use_faceid: Do you want to use FaceID for logging on in the future?
do_you_want_to_use_touchid: Do you want to use TouchID for logging on in the future?
do_you_have_restrictions: Do you have any restrictions on your AHPRA license?
write_work_bio: Write a short work bio about yourself
provide_references: Please provide at least 2 professional references who can vouch for your medical expertise.
upload_required_docs: Please upload all required documents to complete your registration.
upload_medical_license: Upload a clear copy of your current medical license
upload_id_document: Upload a copy of your driver's license or passport
upload_insurance: Upload your current professional indemnity insurance certificate
upload_background_check: Upload your most recent background check or police clearance
terms_text:
By submitting this registration form, you agree to:

• Provide accurate and truthful information
• Maintain the confidentiality of patient information
• Comply with all applicable medical regulations
• Keep your professional credentials current
• Report any changes to your status within 30 days
please_enter_valid_email: Please enter a valid email address
please_write_bio: Please write a short bio about yourself
bio_min_length: Bio should be at least 50 characters long
please_enter_license_expiry: Please enter your license expiry date
please_enter_reference_title: Please enter the reference's job title
please_enter_reference_email: Please enter the reference's email address
please_enter_valid_reference_email: Please enter a valid email address
please_enter_reference_phone: Please enter the reference's phone number
image_picker_placeholder: Image picker functionality will be implemented here.
file_upload_placeholder: File upload functionality will be implemented here.
documents_requirements: You must provide AT LEAST 1 primary document. Documents must be certified copies.
how_to_upload_documents_correctly: How to upload all documents correctly?
working_with_children_check: Working with children check (need a new one for each state you work in)
upload_documents_instructions:
1. Ensure all documents are clear and legible
2. Primary documents must be certified copies
3. Documents must total at least 100 points
4. Supported formats: PDF, JPG, PNG
5. Maximum file size: 10MB per document
references_assessment_info: References will receive an assessment form to complete and return to StatDoctor. Once received, references are verified on your account.
shifts_you_might_be_interested: Shifts you might be interested in
cv_must_be_pdf_file: CV must be a PDF file
cv_must_be_pdf_format: CV must be in PDF format
document_upload_instructions:
1. Ensure all documents are clear and legible
2. Primary documents must be certified copies
3. Documents must total at least 100 points
4. Supported formats: PDF, JPG, PNG, DOC, DOCX, TXT, RTF
5. Maximum file size: 15MB per document
an_error_occurred_during_registration: An error occurred during registration. Please try again.
can_be_pdf_or_file: Can be PDF or file (PDF, JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP, TIFF, DOC, DOCX, TXT, RTF)
review_details_before_applying: Review your details and update them in your profile if needed before applying. When accepted, your email address will be shared with the hospital.
application_successful_notification: If your application is successful, you will receive a notification.
new_hospital_medicare_application: For new hospitals, you will need to apply for a Medicare provider number and/or prescriber number. This form will be emailed to you.
hospital_contact_finalise_paperwork: The hospital will be in contact with you to finalise any additional paperwork.
bio_description: I am a PGY6 doctor with ED and surgical experience. Currently in an unaccredited registrar position, taking 6 months off for locum work in Victoria before starting surgical training.
withdraw_application_confirmation: Are you sure you want to withdraw your application?
cancel_shift_confirmation: Are you sure you want to cancel this shift?
